prompt_results.prompt_text: Turn on the Office WLED every day at 7:00 AM
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_on_7am'
alias: Office WLED On at 7 AM
description: "Turn on the Office WLED strip every day at 7:00 AM"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '07:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled

questions.question_text: Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten

prompt_results.prompt_text: When any living room light is turned on between 9 PM and 11 PM, turn on the Office WLED to 20% brightness, wait 10 seconds, then turn off the Office WLED
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_on_office_wled_pulse'
alias: Living room on → Office WLED 20% pulse
description: "When any living room light is turned on between 9 PM and 11 PM, briefly activate the Office WLED at low brightness, then turn it off."
mode: restart
trigger:
  - platform: state
    # NOTE: Select your actual living room light entities in the UI for this trigger.
    entity_id: []
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '21:00:00'
    before: '23:00:00'
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 20
  - delay: '00:00:10'
  - service: light.turn_off
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled

prompt_results.prompt_text: Every 15 mins choose a random effect on the Office WLED device. Play the effect for 15 secs. Choose random effect, random colors and brightness to 100%. At the end of the 15 sec the WLED light needs to return to exactly what it was before it started.
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_random_chaos_15min'
alias: Office WLED Random Chaos Every 15 Minutes
description: "Every 15 minutes, briefly take the Office WLED strip on a 15-second random detour and then restore it to its previous state."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time_pattern
    minutes: '/15'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_random_chaos
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 100
      effect: random
      rgb_color: "{{ [ (range(0,255)|random), (range(0,255)|random), (range(0,255)|random) ] }}"
  - delay: '00:00:15'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_random_chaos

prompt_results.prompt_text: When the Office WLED is turned on, save its current state. Then turn on all living room lights to 80%. After 10 minutes, restore the Office WLED to its saved state and turn off all living room lights
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_temporary_80'
alias: Office WLED → Temporary Living Room Light at 80%
description: Save Office WLED state, light up Living Room, then restore after 10 minutes
mode: restart
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.wled
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'
variables:
  target_brightness: 204
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_living_room
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness: "{{ target_brightness }}"
  - delay: '00:10:00'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_living_room
  - service: light.turn_off
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2

prompt_results.prompt_text: Check the time. If it's between 6 AM and 9 AM, turn on the Office WLED to 50% with a warm white color and turn off all living room lights. If it's between 5 PM and 8 PM, turn on all living room lights to 80% and set the Office WLED to 100% with a cool white color. If it's after 9 PM, turn on the Office WLED to 20% brightness and turn off all living room lights. Wait 5 seconds after any action.
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_time_routine'
alias: Office WLED and Living Room Time Routine
description: "Time-based Office WLED and living room routine exactly matching your schedule. Living room actions are TODO placeholders."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time_pattern
    minutes: "/1"
  - platform: homeassistant
    event: start
conditions: []
action:
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "06:00:00"
            before: "09:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 50
              rgb_color: [255, 180, 110]
          # TODO: Turn OFF all living room lights here, e.g.:
          # - service: light.turn_off
          #   target:
          #     entity_id:
          #       - light.living_room_main
          #       - light.living_room_lamp
          - delay: "00:00:05"
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "17:00:00"
            before: "20:00:00"
        sequence:
          # TODO: Turn ON all living room lights to 80% brightness here, e.g.:
          # - service: light.turn_on
          #   target:
          #     entity_id:
          #       - light.living_room_main
          #       - light.living_room_lamp
          #   data:
          #     brightness_pct: 80
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 100
              rgb_color: [200, 230, 255]
          - delay: "00:00:05"
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "21:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 20
              rgb_color: [255, 180, 110]
          # TODO: Turn OFF all living room lights here, e.g.:
          # - service: light.turn_off
          #   target:
          #     entity_id:
          #       - light.living_room_main
          #       - light.living_room_lamp
          - delay: "00:00:05"
    default: []

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living, living_room, office
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten

prompt_results.prompt_text: When any living room light changes state, check the time and the current brightness of the Office WLED. If it's daytime (6 AM to 6 PM) and the Office WLED is below 50%, turn it on to 70%. If it's nighttime (6 PM to 6 AM) and any living room light is above 60%, dim the Office WLED to 30%. If the Office WLED is already at the target brightness, do nothing. Wait 2 seconds between each check and action.
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_adjust_on_living_room_changes'
alias: Office WLED – Adjust on Living Room Changes
description: "Basic Office WLED brightness adjustment based on time of day and living room light changes. Add your living-room light entity_ids to the trigger and living_room_ids variable."
mode: restart
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: []
variables:
  office_wled_brightness_pct: >-
    {% if state_attr('light.wled', 'brightness') is not none %}
      {{ (state_attr('light.wled', 'brightness') | int(0) / 255 * 100) | round(0) }}
    {% else %}
      0
    {% endif %}
  living_room_ids: >-
    {{ [
      ] }}
  living_room_max_brightness_pct: >-
    {% set ids = living_room_ids %}
    {% set b = [] %}
    {% for e in ids %}
      {% if state_attr(e, 'brightness') is not none %}
        {% set _ = b.append(state_attr(e, 'brightness') | int(0)) %}
      {% endif %}
    {% endfor %}
    {% if b|length > 0 %}
      {{ ((b|max) / 255 * 100) | round(0) }}
    {% else %}
      0
    {% endif %}
conditions:
  - condition: template
    value_template: "{{ not is_state('light.wled', 'unavailable') }}"
action:
  - delay: "00:00:02"
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "06:00:00"
            before: "18:00:00"
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ office_wled_brightness_pct < 50 }}"
        sequence:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ office_wled_brightness_pct < 67 or office_wled_brightness_pct > 73 }}"
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 70
      - conditions:
          - condition: or
            conditions:
              - condition: time
                after: "18:00:00"
                before: "23:59:59"
              - condition: time
                after: "00:00:00"
                before: "06:00:00"
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ living_room_max_brightness_pct > 60 }}"
        sequence:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ office_wled_brightness_pct < 27 or office_wled_brightness_pct > 33 }}"
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 30
